channel.title: Problems with connecting to Server?
channel.description: My server has been operating for the greater part of the day. A few hours ago, I closed the server and then attempted to restart it a few minutes later. I started it up normally, made sure no-ip didn't need to update, but when I tried to log in, I got the no response from server message. I've tried restarting the server and the computer, but still no luck. Any suggestions? Server is Funscape.no-ip.info[br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 12:10:18 AM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Problems with connecting to Server?
item.dc:creator: @Mikkel-MsKings Mikkel-MsKings
item.description:
@Mikkel-MsKings wrote:

mine does that too u could just join ur hamachi ip OR 127.0.0.1 i tried but it still didnt work and i restarted it BOING! then it worked…( maybe get a new ip )

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with connecting to Server?
item.dc:creator: @Hydronix Hydronix
item.description:
@Hydronix wrote:

My server has been operating for the greater part of the day. A few hours ago, I closed the server and then attempted to restart it a few minutes later. I started it up normally, made sure no-ip didn’t need to update, but when I tried to log in, I got the no response from server message. I’ve tried restarting the server and the computer, but still no luck. Any suggestions? Server is Funscape.no-ip.info[br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 12:10:18 AM[/size][hr]bump
